terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Content: By accessing and using Girandola Localizzatore ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement.
terms.section2Content: Girandola Localizzatore is a location tracking application that allows users to mark and share points of interest ("Girandolas"). The Service requires user authentication via Google OAuth and uses GPS location data.
terms.section3Content: To use the Service, you must sign in with a Google account. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account. You must not use the Service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
terms.section4Content: By using the Service, you grant us permission to collect and store your GPS location data when you add Girandolas. This data is associated with your user account and may be visible to other users of the Service.
terms.section5Content: You retain ownership of any location data you submit to the Service. By submitting data, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive license to use, store, and display this data as part of the Service.
terms.section6Content: You agree not to: (a) use the Service for any unlawful purpose; (b) attempt to gain unauthorized access to the Service; (c) interfere with the proper functioning of the Service; (d) submit false or misleading location data.
terms.section7Content: The Service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee that the Service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.
terms.section8Content: In no event shall Girandola Localizzatore be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of the Service.
terms.section9Content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.
terms.section10Content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our GitHub repository.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Content: We collect the following information: (a) Account information from your Google account (name, email, profile picture); (b) GPS location data when you add Girandolas; (c) Timestamps of when Girandolas are created.
privacy.section2Content: We use your information to: (a) Provide and maintain the Service; (b) Display your Girandolas on the map; (c) Show you in the Top Contributors list; (d) Allow you to export your location data.
privacy.section3Content: Your location data (GPS coordinates and timestamps) are visible to all users of the Service. Your email address is visible only to you. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
privacy.section4Content: Your data is stored securely in a Neon Postgres database. Location data includes latitude, longitude, creation timestamp, and association with your user ID.
privacy.section5Content: We use the following third-party services: (a) Google OAuth for authentication; (b) OpenStreetMap for map display (via Leaflet); (c) Neon for database hosting; (d) Vercel for web hosting.
privacy.section6Content: You have the right to: (a) Export your location data via the CSV export feature; (b) Delete your account and associated data by contacting us; (c) Revoke Google OAuth access through your Google account settings.
privacy.section7Content: On Android, the app requests ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION permission to access GPS. This permission is only used when you explicitly choose "Use My GPS" to add a Girandola. You can revoke this permission in Android settings.
privacy.section8Content: We use session cookies for authentication via NextAuth.js. These cookies are essential for the Service to function and are deleted when you sign out.
privacy.section9Content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify users of significant changes by updating the "Last updated" date.
privacy.section10Content: For privacy-related questions or to request data deletion, please contact us through our GitHub repository.
